title: MSP Say Brother Trips, Shoots Sister in Face in Alcona County
content:
Michigan State Police say an 11-year-old boy accidentally shot his sister in the face while hunting in Alcona County.
It happened just before 10 this morning.
Troopers say the 11-year-old tripped while carrying a 12 gauge shotgun at his family's hunting camp.
The gun went off and hit his 13-year-old sister in the face.
She was taken to the hospital with serious injuries but is expected to be okay.
